# init(ranges:)

**Initializer**

Create multiple selections with a given range-set.

## Declaration

```swift
init(ranges: RangeSet<String.Index>)
```

## Parameters

- **ranges**: A range-set of `String.Index` representing the selection.
title: init(ranges:)
